item.title: CDC spiraled into chaos this week. Here’s where things stand.
item.description: CDC is in crisis amid an ouster, resignations, defiance, and outraged lawmakers.

item.title: RFK Jr. posted fishing pics as CDC reeled from shooting linked to vaccine disinfo
item.description: Anti-vaccine activist RFK Jr. has vilified COVID-19 vaccines and the CDC.

item.title: RFK Jr. wants to change program that stopped vaccine makers from leaving US market
item.description: RFK Jr. is targeting a little-known program that underpins childhood immunizations in the US.
